scenes.action_text: "THE BOURNE IDENTITY" by Tony Gilroy Based on the novel by Robert Ludlum PARIS DRAFT 9/20/00 DARKNESS. THE SOUND OF WIND AND SPRAY. MUSIC. TITLES. EXT. OCEAN -- NIGHT The darkness is actually water. A SEARCHLIGHT arcs across heavy ocean swells. Half-a-dozen flashlights -- weaker beams -- racing along what we can see is the deck of an a
